mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Miley, Michael, 1841-1918
mdRecord.dcterms:description: These pictures are portraits of Nell Brokenbrough. All three poses show head and shoulders. In each pose, she is wearing different clothing although all three blouses are white. Only Pose 3 has a date: 1907. In Pose 1 she is wearing a straw hat. These prints were made from the original glass plate negatives, which are housed at Virginia Historical Society.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Portraits of Nell Brokenbrough (photographs)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Portrait photography
Virginia -- Rockbridge County
Twentieth century
